sys_script_include.name: getRecord1Count

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_71bb8a0f2fc22010fdd651172799b6a2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.getRecord1Count</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>getRecord1Count</name><script><![CDATA[var CountRecords = Class.create();


CountRecords.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {



   getRecord1Count: function() {


       var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');



       var ga = new GlideAggregate(table);


       //ga.addQuery('active', true); // Optional query


       ga.addAggregate('COUNT');


       ga.query();


       var count = 0;


       if (ga.next())


           count = ga.getAggregate('COUNT');


       return count;


   },



   type: 'CountRecords'


});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-05 07:18:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>71bb8a0f2fc22010fdd651172799b6a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRecord1Count</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_71bb8a0f2fc22010fdd651172799b6a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-05 07:18:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
